>Actually, we are using selenium grid. This could be serializing our
requests.

No. It's your code.

[DF] Well I created a test harness that just fired up a bunch of threads and each thread just created a new DefaultSelenium.
The only way I could get the tests from blocking was to start multiple clients connecting to the grid hub.
Is it possible that the hub will only give 1 request to a worker at a time?
